# EMEP EEA Emission factors data-base

Access to the EMEP EEA emission factors tier 2.
https://www.eea.europa.eu/publications/emep-eea-guidebook-2019


### Installation

```r
library(remotes) 
install_gitlab("ibarraespinosa/emep")
```
